item.title: Intentionally biased AI chatbots
item.description: Left, Right or Center The rise of chatbots has revolutionized the way we interact with technology. With the advancements in natural language processing, chatbots have become more human-like in their responses, making them an attractive tool for businesses and organizations to communicate with customers. However, there is a new development in the world of chatbots that has raised concerns: intentionally biased chatbots. The concern is not about the AI chatbots that are deliberately designed by nefarious actors to spread misinformation and propaganda - although they will surely use AI to supercharge their current bots.
